Installation guide
==================


The ``GPS`` package can be installed via pip:

it can be installed via pip:

.. code-block:: bash

    pip install GPS


or via the source code:

.. code-block:: bash

    git clone https://github.com/LeonSong1995/GPS.git
    cd GPS
    pip install -e .

Verify the installation by running the following command:

.. code-block:: bash

    GPS -v
